ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Main_Cause__c ,'Additional Notice'), ISPICKVAL( Main_Cause__c ,'Duplicate Notice') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c , 'Withdrawn - Duplicate/Additional Notice')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Code must be Withdrawn - Duplicate/Additional Notice if the Main Cause is Additional Notice or Duplicate Notice.
